website_summaries.verdict: An extremely convenient - but pricey - option that lets you steam and blend without transferring the food.
pros: Steams and processes food in the same machine, in 10 minutes or less
Settings for all stages, from purees to chunky food for older babies
cons: Questionable durability, and some say that components are hard to keep clean

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: We adored our Baby Brezza Formula Pro, so when we wanted to buy a baby food maker this was our first choice. However, we had the same issue many others have experienced with metallic and black flakes in our purees! This happened the very first time our baby food maker was used. I am so disappointed and will be returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: gmcbrc

customer_reviews.title: Falls short
customer_reviews.text: Food particles get stuck underneath glass which seems very unsanitary to me. Otherwise the product performs awesome and I’ve loved using it- I’m just apprehensive to use it since you can’t effectively clean it. I’ve emailed Baby Brezza twice and not received a response. I will be returning. The pictures are after merely hand washing in the sink. The particles are underneath the glass bottom.
customer_reviews.author: surthn

customer_reviews.title: Unsanitary.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after doing much research. I received it and washed it.... upon washing it I noticed that water accumulates in the lid (where the water to steam goes from the tank to the food) as well as the base of the blender bowl between the glass and plastic. These are areas that will jot dry properly. Do to this I am returning it... I do not want to take the chance of contaminating the healthy food I had planned to make.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Y.

customer_reviews.title: Short Live
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a few weeks then suddenly the steam comes out and no longer cooks the food. I have been unable to activate the product warranty link. For the price we expected a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: The capacity was way too small....when steaming the maching got way too hot to touch and put off a burning smell. I found that using my steamer pot did a much faster job ans I could make the amount I wanted in one shot.
customer_reviews.author: Shoptiludrop

customer_reviews.title: When the product came I didn't like the quality of that plastic
customer_reviews.text: When my baby turned 6 mothers old I ordered baby brezza. When the product came I didn't like the quality of that plastic, it's smell when heated and scratches on it. We used it just for 6 months once a day and the plastic cup cracked 2 days ago. I wish I knew that it has such a short life!
customer_reviews.author: Iuliia

customer_reviews.title: I would die without my Baby Brezza Formula Pro...but I'd rather die than use this baby food maker!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't chop at all & the blending attachment sits too high up in the bowl to effectively blend the food well when you are making small batches which is a pretty stupid design flaw because it's a blender to make fresh food for a baby which means that its always a small batch...am I right?? I'm not trying to make a huge batch that I then have to can & preserve...if I was into that I would be at Walmart grabbing goo in pouches to feed my kid because it's a WHOLE LOT easier than trying to work with this machine. I would die without my Baby Brezza Formula Pro...but I'd rather die than use this baby food maker!
customer_reviews.author: Logan Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good Baby Food Cooker, but......
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to make baby food for my little one. After using this 5 times the blade won’t turn anymore if there’s food in the bowl! It looks like the turning mechanism in the base is stripped & partially worn down?! This shouldn’t happen after just several usage! I’m bummed cause besides this issue, it was really easy to use & produced what I needed when it was working! Wish the company made this with more durable parts! I’m trying the Beaba Neo next!
customer_reviews.author: hammy sandwich

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting but wish it had 2 bowls
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this about two years ago and used it to make baby food for both of my children. Love the fact that it steams and blends with the touch of a single button. If I needed a new one, I would buy the Baby Brezza baby food maker again but this time, get the one with the glass bowl. I noticed the plastic became harder to clean over time. I also wish they made a model with double bowls so you could make more batches at one time.
customer_reviews.author: MomofTheWildThings

customer_reviews.title: Metallic smell/taste
customer_reviews.text: It looked like a convenient way to make baby food, but was unusable because the food came out with a metallic smell and taste. After the first run, I cleaned the product with vinegar and made many batches of food to throw away in hopes the smell would go away. Did not, had to return it. Big waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Smooth purée with minimal fuss Streams evenly and easily Quality materials Helpful guide Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Smooth purée with minimal fuss Streams evenly and easily Quality materials Helpful guide Cons: Doesn’t hold much for steaming Device is testy- will shut off in error There’s a learning curve for figuring out use Bottom line: need to practice how to use properly, works great once you figure it out, makes excellent purée. I would recommend this product for making small batches of food. TIP: run the product through a couple of cycles to get out plastic smell.
customer_reviews.author: Howard L.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this product a 5 star but saddly I cannot. The product stopped steaming after 4 uses. I called customer service for help. They were extremely rude & cut me off everytime I tried to spell out my email to make sure it was correct in their system. They said the unit would need to be replaced. Said they would email me the warranty paperwork. I waited a month & checked my inbox & spam folders daily. Nothing popped up so now I'm returning it to Amazon & will not buy another one. Absolutely unacceptable & ridiculous customer service. Just off of the customer service alone I would never buy another product of theirs ever.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Cantley

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I searched many baby food maker and decide to buy this one because all of the food maker have their own cons. I used this one for twice and I found it is very difficult to clean. The blender is not easy to clean and the cup will full with water when I washed it. I tried to make broccoli using steam and blend together but I found it is not ready to eat at all then I tried to steam first and waste the water out then only blend but it is more terrible! Not blend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Yanyi

customer_reviews.title: I love the glass container
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted to cook baby food in a glass container vs. a plastic container. I love the glass container. Very simple and easy to use. Has suction cups on the bottom of the machine to prevent it from accidentally being knocked off the counter. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the blender isn't great. My Vitamix is better. I made frozen peas and there was still a lot of the pea shell left in the mixture. it was great for blending softer foods such as sweet potato.
customer_reviews.author: Edmond Lee

customer_reviews.title: you would think it would do a better job of that
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it’s the only one I could find that’s glass, not plastic. But considering it only has one blend setting, which should be purée since this is for babies, you would think it would do a better job of that. Often foods come out chunkier than they should be. No matter how long I let it blend and what type of food I use it’s never truly puréed. Also they should have made it smaller and more compact. Counters get really cluttered when you have a young baby, and I’ve never filled it up more than a quarter when making food. I should have probably just gone with an actual blender.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver product
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to use at first and we had a couple Of issues but they have amazing customer service and now I can’t live without this and use it to make many things which need steaming and then crushing . I have recommended to many new mommies as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You’ll have so much fun with this!
customer_reviews.text: my Baby never loved eating so much!! And it’s also made dinner time and life so much easier for me. You can literally make your baby anything in this bad boy! While cooking for myself I just pop some veggies or fruit in here, set it to steam/ purée come back in 5-10 minutes and my baby has a healthy meal. She also loves the pouches that come with! Also comes with a recipe book but there are also hundreds of cool receipts online to.
customer_reviews.author: victoria manuel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this for my second child as i thought it would be nice to make my homemade baby food compared to that of the store. This has been amazing. I can make baby food within 30min. I also use it to make homemade Popsicle for my son whos 3.
customer_reviews.author: medicalgirl

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases made
customer_reviews.text: Best Buy!!!! Great to make baby purees or simply to just steam up some veggies. Works great for when baby begins solids till later on. Love that you can steam and then it blends automatically. One less thing to worry about. Us moms have too much on our plate, whether you’re first time momma or a mom of multiples we definitely need a little help sometimes. Definitely recommended for all the mommas out there.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: Stops working randomly
customer_reviews.text: Let me make it clear. It’s an excellent product while it works. Unfortunately it stops working very soon. Blending power: it’s very good. You can make baby purées and I enjoyed making baby food in it. I ordered in January and it stopped working in March. Amazon sent me a replacement as it was still under the time Period when they would replace it. Now it’s early May and it stopped working randomly once more. I called amazon and they told me I will have to call the manufacturer. So it’s a good product but does not last long. That’s why I gave it one star.
customer_reviews.author: Moniza Munawar

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Works way easier than food processor for the amount of food I need to make for one baby. Super quick, 1 button, 1 dish! I wish I didn’t have to hold the blend button down (maybe I’m doing it wrong) when I just want to blend and not steam. It only takes 30 seconds tho so it’s not so bad. Highly recommend! With this, there’s really no reason to not make your own baby food! Can probably make your own smoothies in it too!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: This product NEVER works properly for anyone I know
customer_reviews.text: Literal POS. Do not waste your time and money. All the crappy reviews are accurate. We depend on these machines to MAKE BABY FOOD. It’s our second Baby Brezza and last. Every single person I know has had a failing Brezza and you’d think they would compensate or actually put out a working product by now. I absolutely will not recommend this brand ever again
customer_reviews.author: ILikeBigStuffAndICanNotLie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like plastic, smells like plastic
customer_reviews.text: I noticed I could smell the hot plastic when I used this and thought maybe it just needs to be broken in. Used it several more times and tasted the blended food which also had a plastic taste to it and noticed no difference over time. No wonder my baby didn’t want to eat the food it was puréeing! Returning this item. Great concept, but the plastic pieces used on the blender portion completely defeats the purpose of buying a glass product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Breecher

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Like you can steam and blend but does not purée as good as baby bullet. Tried purée chicken & veggies but it was not smooth. Had to move everything into bullet to get smooth consistency. Also it leaks at the spout when mixing. Did not overfill but once it started it would shoot up and leak. It was a mess. I though it would make it quick and easy to steam and blend but now my counter, the machine and the bullet need to be washed.
customer_reviews.author: LeelooTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Worst Customer Service EVER
customer_reviews.text: Just hope nothing goes wrong with your food maker.. cause if it does nobody @ Baby Brezza seems to be able to answer a simple question. Been asking a simple question for almost 20 days, and not only it takles them 3 to 4 BUSINESS days to answer each mail, they keep answer some random information about the product, yet no actual answer to the simple question asked.
customer_reviews.author: David Ickowicz

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one month
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked well for about a month then shorted out completely. Others on here have noted similar issues with these units not functioning properly in a very short amount of time after receiving them. I returned the unit and we will go with a different brand, Brezza's Food Maker is unreliable and of poor quality, apparently. It is a shame because we use the formula maker from Brezza and it has been a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: deaconhound

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: This baby food maker is very helpful. Blending power good, easy to use and clean. The biggest problem is quality of plastic! The plastic bowl cracked after 3 months of using. After 4 months it starts leaking. I wrote them and asked for a new bowl because it was with guarantee for one year. The answer was that I will have a new food maker. In few days I received completely different model of food maker. It was the same poor quality and it was difficult to use. After all, I had to throw away whole food maker.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This baby food maker is amazing! I used the Baby Bullet with my first son but knew I needed to streamline/simplify the food making process with my second child. The Baby Brezza is sooo easy to use! I love it and wish I’d had it for my first baby. I love the the fact that the food is being steamed in a glass container versus a plastic one. It’s worth the money to buy the glass model.
customer_reviews.author: Nrconder

customer_reviews.title: Time saver!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great timesaver for making baby food - just pop some chopped food in, hit the button, and come back to cooked and pureed food 15 minutes later. Just make sure that the units suction cups are securely grabbing your countertop or else it will end up on your floor!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver. Easy to use. It takes a little more time then doing it yourself, but just knowing at a push of a button it does it and you can just walk away, is pretty amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher McHenry

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: It did not blend well after cooking. Left the food chunky instead of a puree for my twins. Also, it completely broke after maybe a dozen uses. I learned about a instant pot blender that also cooks, and it works magically. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to use this product. Unfortunately, it doesn't work; it simply beeps and then, turns off. There is no easy troubleshooting for the problem available. I had to reach out to customer service and provide pictures and whatnot to determine whether the warranty will cover the problem. From posts online, it seems like this is a common problem.
customer_reviews.author: dlm

customer_reviews.title: blessing for home made puree
customer_reviews.text: If you want to make homemade puree this is the best. The container is made of glass which I like the best. If we empty the water tank every time ur done with using and dry it up with a towel there is no mold so far. we have been using it for 1 month, almost every other day.
customer_reviews.author: rajya shilpa

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy to chose one cup food maker with no additional ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy to chose one cup food maker with no additional parts like other food makes. It's easy to use, easy to clean. Today it took 5 or 7 minutes for me to cook puree for my son including dicing-cooking-washing and 20 minutes for the food maker to cook while I was playing with my son. Perfect. And it was delivered faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Lovely concept horrible design. Because of the separate glass and plastic pieces and lack of good seal, water and food gets stuck and after not even 2 months I have mold. Return process is a hassle..my baby is strictly fed with homemade food and will now be without and using jar food until I can replace.. super disappointing considering money spent.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: The replacement one showed up broken as well
customer_reviews.text: The first one we received the container was cracked and it leaked food everywhere. My wife loved it so much she didn't tell me and just put towels under it. 2 weeks later I saw what she was doing and returned it. The second one showed up cracked worse than the first one. It's a great concept however very poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It is such an efficient use of time and as a new mom I need all the extra time I can find. I've only made sweet potato puree, so far, but it worked like a charm. I followed the instructions and cut my sweet potato into small pieces, used the steam and blend option for 25 minutes and BAM- it was done!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t imagine making baby food with out it
customer_reviews.text: Love all of baby brezza products. Have all except formula maker as my baby is exclusive breast milk. This products allows homemade baby food sooo easy. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Krislc13

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Beware
customer_reviews.text: So we just recently pulled this unit off the shelf from previous use with my older baby, but this is what we found in the water reservoir. We bought it 2 years ago after light use we put it into storage. In a dry storage. Very disappointed with the product. Hoping the seller fixes the issue by replacing the base. Otherwise it is not worth buying because it only worked for a few months before being stored away.
customer_reviews.author: Maiia Luzanova

customer_reviews.title: The Brezza product is great, we had one for our daughter
customer_reviews.text: The Brezza product is great, we had one for our daughter. The one we got was obviously used and returned, some small rust underneath.(which seems is a common issue, i'll have to pull out our old one to check) the cord end was removed and you could tell it was used. If it wasn't for a gift for a baby it might not be as big a deal, just sterilize and move on, but couldn't do it for a baby.
customer_reviews.author: David Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Works great and love the glass!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. I primarily selected this unit for the glass bowl but am overall happy with the purchase - works great for everything from sweet potatoes to kale. Can bit a bit tricky to get lid and bowl aligned. Also, no idea what the instructions mean about keeping the blades elevated - I tired for 15 min before giving up and just using as is and had zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Haire

customer_reviews.title: All you get is 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: At first this was great. I love the features of steam and blend. I didn't pay to much attention to the fact that once it stem and didn't blend on its own after the fact that I set that setting. I don't mind small glitches. However, I have been busy making baby food and it comes in handy. I am on my 3rd and I am disappointed that the machine is no longer working properly. It is not steaming past 10 minutes and it is not blending. I would suggest doing more research to get a quality blender that will last way over 3 months. Not worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: 10 star product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this baby food maker. It works great and super easy to clean. I go crazy when it’s time to make fresh healthy food for my twins I know exactly what’s going into their food and they love it. This product is a great price and saves you tons of money on baby food. If you make too much freeze it and use it for later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby registry must!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love baby brezza! This was so amazing. It pretty much does everything for you, all you have to do is the prep. Peel and cut. It was super easy to use and clean. I always used distilled water so I didn’t have to worry about hard water stains or mineralization.
customer_reviews.author: Chaptat

customer_reviews.title: Metal in my baby’s food
customer_reviews.text: My baby Brezza has broke after only the second time using it. The lid started scraping on the middle orange part and left little shreds of metal in my baby’s food and now every time I try to use it it just shreds metal when I turn on blend mode. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Looove
customer_reviews.text: I bought this like 8 months ago and today I just used it for the very first time to make my baby's first meal! Easy to use and clean. With one bottom this machine not only steam but blends as well all in one machine with your having to switch or even buy more stuff ! You just set the timer and it does it all .. It can defrost your baby's food as well ... I have three kids and for the first time ever, making baby food has never been much easier
customer_reviews.author: Rana A. Albabtain

customer_reviews.title: i would want to try it again coz i love baby brezza products and inhave heard really good things ...
customer_reviews.text: Inwas so excited about the product but may be its just my peice it made my apple too watery and then it took a while to puree it even though i cut the apple really small ..i would want to try it again coz i love baby brezza products and inhave heard really good things about it
customer_reviews.author: AMIT GARG

customer_reviews.title: Working great. But the lid is hard to clean as ...
customer_reviews.text: Working great. But the lid is hard to clean as water will go inside the lid and create mold easy
customer_reviews.author: ukume023

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning and usage is not friendly
customer_reviews.text: Blending is ok but cleaning bowl, lid and blade is tough. There is a small extension to the lid which clicks to the machine while closing and that was broken after using few months. I will have to buy a new bowl set which is about $40 with shipping for a overall set of $80 which is not at all fine. Replacement parts should be not available in sets.
customer_reviews.author: Srinivas238

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the BabyBrezza so I could make homemade organic food for my baby. So far, I am very happy. It steams and blends in 1 step. If I want to blend more, I just hold the blend button down. It's easy to use and once I'm done, I pop everything on the top rack of the dishwasher and it's clean. EASY is the way I NEED things to be and this makes feeding homemade organic EASY. Just a word of advice, for string beans, peas and other veggies with high fibrous material, I recommend straining with a strainer when pouting into the container. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: zionsinger

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this baby food maker. I can steam and puree all in one step, though I often do it as two steps so I can use breastmilk instead of water. It also allows you to choose how long you want to steam. Plus its easy to clean! Between you and me... I've even made milkshakes in it ;)
customer_reviews.author: Ethan chandler

customer_reviews.title: (Oveheats) not durable and its hard to get conected with customer service
customer_reviews.text: It overheats and its not that easy to clean the water tank. Also, It took me forever to get in contact with customer service, I sent 2 emails and left 3 voicemails (hoping someone will call me back as answering machine said so) and numerous calls attempt but no reply. I ended up returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Works well but poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed this unit. The reason for the low score is fit and finish. When we got the first one it honestly seemed used. The screen had a couple of wet spots inside it and the places where glass container locks into were so poorly finished they looked broken. The replacement had a clear screen but same unfinished latching points. The casting of the plastic parts is just very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. I bought it several months ago and just began using it to make food for our baby girl. So much cheaper, in the long run, than buying jarred baby food. Plus less preservatives and other unnecessary junk in her food. So easy to use and very easy to clean also. I just started using it but so far have made food on Sunday to last us through the week. Hopefully soon I can make more in one day to last for a whole month. Just haven’t yet because she has only tried peas and carrots so far.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Simple and fast ❤️
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like this powerhouse little machine makes enough for a few feedings. The easy and breezy two button step to baby food. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia E. Alhaboul

customer_reviews.title: Great all in one baby food machine
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this machine. It's a small equipment which I appreciate since my kitchen is so small, it does everything in a jiffy and the cleanup is fast and simple (I don't like machine with too many arts to wash...). Only negative its that it blends it chunky and my 5.5 month old needs smooth right now. However it's not really that bad since it has a "steam only" function. I stem it and then with a stick blender I can purée it pretty smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Lipoprotein

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome for mommy's who want to feed their babies fresh ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome for mommy's who want to feed their babies fresh food. First of all instructions are very simple and easy to use. The only thing you need to do is chopping and I just did carrots yesterday and it came out really good. It also come up with recipe book and it tells you recommended time to steam individual and mixture of vegetables and fruits.
customer_reviews.author: ships

customer_reviews.title: Love this food maker.
customer_reviews.text: This had made it easy for me to make food for my twins. If I’m not making purées I steam veggies to make finger foods. The only way to make this product better would be if the blender had a pulse option. I just pulse manually.
customer_reviews.author: Ess Gee Cee

customer_reviews.title: 2 weeks and gone. Low quality. No customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The blender spins in place after just 2 weeks of use. It’s really hard to clean and all the orange plastic parts quickly turned dark brown... I think the heat from the vapor damages the plastic parts. It no longer blends, and their customer service number doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Altairis

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: What an easy, practical and just wonderful product. I also have their formula dispenser and it is great. All their products are well made and super easy to use. For a busy mom this is a life saver!!! Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: We have used the brezza 2 times and it has already cracked. I washed it by hand once and put it on the top rack tonight (like the directions say) and when I pulled it out it had a huge crack in the plastic cup. Like others have said it gives off a very strong plastic smell even after being washed.
customer_reviews.author: Dryan

customer_reviews.title: Trapped water
customer_reviews.text: Returning this for the second time. Water gets trapped between the base and glass and takes days to dry. Even when it does it leaves a dirty residue. Definitely not dish washer friendly and it claims to be. Hand washed the second one and water still got In between .
customer_reviews.author: Brenden P Jackman

customer_reviews.title: A definite must!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it ! Portions were perfect and consistency was perfect. Nice if you only want make portions for one week at a time. Which you should being the the reason you want this product is to feed your baby fresh baby food. NOT FROZEN FOR 30 days at a time. I used mine so much that I burned it out 9 months later. That was fine because by then the baby was ready for table food and the portions were bigger
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Collazo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working twice
customer_reviews.text: The first Baby Breeza I ordered leaked water from the reservoir while it was steaming food. I was able to get a replacement through Amazon. The new one worked for a few months and died AGAIN. The screen doesn't display anything and it doesn't seem to work at all. I would recommend you try something different since this is expensive and doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Giyi

customer_reviews.title: Excelent device
customer_reviews.text: We had smaller plastic version of Baby Brezza. The plastic gotten broken, so we had to replace it, so we tried this one. Glass container is bigger, easier to clean. Food comes out great
customer_reviews.author: Jason and Lily C

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it now for a few weeks and I love it! It’s easy to use, comes with easy to follow instructions and works amazingly. I’ve been able to make delicious foods for my baby. I really liked that it came with recommendations of ages and foods to try giving at that stage. If you looking for something straight to the point and easy to use this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to make baby food!
customer_reviews.text: My wife an I really enjoy this, its super cost effective when it comes to making our daughters baby food. Easy to clean, set up and use! so far we havent had any issues! will update if we do!
customer_reviews.author: Niko Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality. Do not buy. The first one stopped working after using it 4-5 times. Amazon (thankfully) sent the replacement one which never worked so I returned that one as well. I now bought a small pressure cooker and have a hand blender. I do not want to buy any other brand as they all are made out of plastic instead of glass.
customer_reviews.author: ozge

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good!! I’m learning how to make all kinds of food for my baby and so far she has loved it all. This has been an amazing journey. My son ate gerber foods for like 3 weeks and went straight for our food never looked back so I have been enjoying this stage of life with my daughter plus she loves to eat whatever we make
customer_reviews.author: Lavina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Many foods need an adjustment with the amount of water to stay in before it can blend, so often I only steam, drain, then blend (which means stand there and hold the button). That is really my only complaint, though!
customer_reviews.author: A. Winter

customer_reviews.title: Burning smell after a few months....
customer_reviews.text: It's been about 4 months of light use maybe 2x a week and there is a burning rubber smell coming from the device and it slowly goes from fast to slow like its dying. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, horrible construction
customer_reviews.text: So this idea is great. But I am now on my third Baby Brezza and this thing is just so poorly made. The motor drive is not properly protected, so liquids can do and get on it, which creates a mess and then causes the drive to cease up. The bowl itself is an absolutely cheap plastic, which cracks and chips so easily. If you buy this product, you will probably find it to be a brilliant idea. You will however notice that this is a cheaply made piece of junk not worth anything close to $100.
customer_reviews.author: tiff_tiff_tiff

customer_reviews.title: Glad I chose this one
customer_reviews.text: If you watch demonstrations of each of the two best selling machines on u tube, you will see for yourself that this is the one to get. One less step (no transfer) makes this the choice for me. I have had no problems at all with this machine but do watch out for the super sharp blades. The only drawback I would comment on is that it is hard to separate the blade from the drive shaft for placing the blade into the dishwasher but I still manage to do it, just wish the separation were easier.
customer_reviews.author: RH from CA

customer_reviews.title: I just love it and very simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny spent on this one. Absolute breeze to make home made baby food. I just love it and very simple to use. Definitely recommend for mothers who wants to make fresh home food for their babies.
customer_reviews.author: TMD

customer_reviews.title: NOT DURABLE, breaks and leaks after 5months
customer_reviews.text: I got Baby Brezza in Sep 2018 it was great a few months ago until it started to leak. Then it cracked. I will not buy another. It’s too expensive to have to replace every 5months.
customer_reviews.author: Val X valencia McKinnon

customer_reviews.title: Baby Approved
customer_reviews.text: I cut myself trying to clean the crevices. It's a great product and easy to use. I love the steaming part, then it purees it so smoothly!
customer_reviews.author: SHOP O' HOLIC

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for the first time to make my daughter's first few batches of baby food. Absolutely love it! It assembles and disassembles super easily, and cleans perfectly in the dishwasher. It is so nice to set it and forget it....once the steam cycle is complete it purees on it's own! You can also use it just to steam veggies and fruits for older babies. I was actually told to look into some of the other baby food processors, but so glad I decided to go with my gut and get the Baby Brezza!
customer_reviews.author: fire8angel

customer_reviews.title: Set it and forget it
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! It was really important to me that we make our own food for our daughter and this helped make it possible. My husband and I both work fulltime and she is still able to have homemade purees with every meal.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Merz

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money... No Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in November, 2 weeks before my daughter was born. I started using it in June and I loved it. But, 1 month after the heater stopped working. I have sent about 3 emails ... nobody answers. I've called thousands of times ... nobody answers. Customer service sucks. Do not buy this product. It was a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect I love it
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect I love it. Making baby food is so easy to do with this, you prepare the fruit or veggie by shopping and peeling, press a couple buttons and walk away. Cleaning can be frustrating with the tube on the blades just because its hard to really get in there but honestly if you clean/rinse/soak right after use it shouldnt be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: My best purchase since my baby was born
customer_reviews.text: Please purchase this and save your baby from eating processed foods that contain lead....Gerber and all of the baby food jars contain lead .... not good for brain development.... keep you baby safe and use an amazing product like this one to cook and blend your baby foods fresh
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Watery, chunky, inedible food.
customer_reviews.text: Even though container is glass, the piece in the middle is plastic along with the cover where the steam travels. Leaves food tasting like plastic even after many uses. Also, food does not steam well. Still chunky after 15 minutes of steaming finely sliced sweet potatoes and super watery because of excess steam. Not a well thought out product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value - Best Baby Food Maker
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best baby food maker. It's easy to use offering an all in one design. This particular model features a plastic bowl that I found it to be an excellent value compared to mortar & brick stores or other online sites.
customer_reviews.author: Gramsy2Three

customer_reviews.title: Try another brand
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one we bought and the blender doesn’t work at all. We can use it to steam though. We bought the first one at buybuybaby and it worked perfectly for 2 years. The parts had a lot of wear and tear so we bought this one. If it worked, we would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever! (No spare parts though)
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever! We give it as a present to every single expecting mom we know. After 7 months of non stop use, the plastic container was not looking that good and we tried to find the spare part, but I guess they don't sell it. Eventually, we traveled with the Baby Brezza in one of our suitcases and of course, the plastic container got destroyed, so that forced us to get a whole new unit. Aside from the lack of spare parts, it's the best invention out there for busy working moms and dads that want to feed their babies healthy home made food.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod D. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Its a Junk
customer_reviews.text: I need a Refund! Broke in two months Of use, use only few in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Rona

customer_reviews.title: Total let down
customer_reviews.text: This product is a waste of time and money. Received my baby brezza food maker and was excited to start my baby on solids but this item was a total let down. The food was steaming but it wasn’t blending. We tried everything possible and double checked everything, still was unable to get the food blended.
customer_reviews.author: Varun

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought a Ninja...
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprisingly disappointed with this blender. It had such good reviews! It steams food well enough. But it really does not BLEND well. All food just gets pushed to the walls of the container and it takes forever to blend it considering the amount of times I have to remove the lid, scrape the sides, blend, and repeat. I may be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I don't like is the inability to remove the water holding area ...
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I don't like is the inability to remove the water holding area to thoroughly clean from time to time. Its been a great product though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good only if you keep on using it doesn't store well after usage
customer_reviews.text: this is my second baby brezza .. this thing works well IF you keep on using it but if you store it away it doesn't matter what type of water you use it will create a settlement inside the water heating reservoir and you will have to throw it away..(I have tried to clean it many ways)
customer_reviews.author: Meron

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after a few months of use and very Disappointing warranty
customer_reviews.text: I love this baby food maker. First I ever owned and it make my life sooo much easier. However the plastic parts broken on me after only 5-6 months of daily use. This was very disappointing, specially after finding they only carry a 1 year warranty. Also, they don't sell the parts separately. This means, a few months after my warranty it's up I will have to look into buying a whole new baby food maker. This time I will look for a different brand, better quality and better warranty as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works incredibly well!  So easy for me to make baby food!
customer_reviews.text: This product works so well and it is incredibly easy to use. All I have to do is add water to the steamer reservoir, cut up all the ingredients to the right size (per the included recipe guide), add them into the container, close the lid, set time and press "start". I can then walk away and 20 minutes later I get steamed and perfectly pureed baby food! Now I have no excuse not to make my own baby food at home!
customer_reviews.author: May R.

customer_reviews.title: You won't be dissapointed!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a home-baby-food-making wonder. Using the guide/cookbook that the company provides it has simplified the task of making simple, healthy baby food for our little one. The only downside I know of is the smallish bowl size. I originally wanted to buy the larger capacity Baby Brezza that was offered at Williams Sonoma but they were out of stock or discontinued so I went with this one and I'm highly pleased, but would prefer a larger bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Willji

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, very useful. The only problem is that food/vegetables stays between its handle and can't be washed.
customer_reviews.author: sahar javidtash

customer_reviews.title: ... my 3rd baby food maker and by fat the best one. i had the plastic baby brezza before ...
customer_reviews.text: this is my 3rd baby food maker and by fat the best one. i had the plastic baby brezza before this one and i liked it but the plastic starts to wear and stain. love the glass one.
customer_reviews.author: Ariane M.

customer_reviews.title: Used product was sold as new
customer_reviews.text: Product was used. It had food from the previous buyer and it had mold in the water tank.
customer_reviews.author: P. M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love my baby food maker. It’s very simple to use and I have used it regularly for my son. It’s easy to use and clean which allows it to be hassle free and save money. Best feature is that’s it’s made out of glass.
customer_reviews.author: ERIKA CARBAJAL

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This made making my own, healthy, organic baby food soooo much easier. I love how it steams the food and then purées it without me having to do anything but chop the veggies and fruits! The bags are bpa free and dishwasher friendly, so that’s a plus as well. Wish i had this for my first child as well!
customer_reviews.author: Leila Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Over priced and not worth the hassle for a product that doesn’t work and is hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to really like and keep this product but the only good thing about this was the glass container. The steam and purée combo doesn’t work. The steam keeps turning off automatically before timer goes off and never fully steamed veggies. The unit is easy to clean but reservoir for water cannot be detached or cleaned properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works well but wasn't the best
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent baby food maker but I liked the Beabe better. The amour of food you can make at one time wasn't as much as I was hoping for, especially since you have to be careful not to push down the blades too far. It wasn't always helpful that it steamed and then automatically puréed because sometimes it ended up too watery so we stopped using that feature. It is a decent product but I think that there are better ones available.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan A. Thompson

product_meta.title: Baby Brezza Small Baby Food Maker Set – Cooker and Blender in One to Steam and Puree Baby Food for Pouches - Make Organic Food for Infants and Toddlers - Includes 3 Pouches and 3 Funnels
product_meta.description: Style:DeluxeThe baby brezza one step baby food maker complete brings healthy, homemade baby food to your table in just minutes. Its one-of-a-kind, patented features take the hassle out of creating delicious, wholesome purees for your baby by automatically blending food after steaming! The bowl has a 3 cup capacity, great for either making a quick meal or cooking several portions at once. The removable water tank makes filling and cleaning a cinch. With the baby brezza one step baby food maker complete, making homemade baby food is truly a breeze! Baby brezza one step baby food maker complete also comes with three reusable feeding and storage pouches, as well as an easy-to-use funnel that makes baby brezza baby food pouches the easiest to fill. 1 Year Limited Warranty.
feature_bullets: COOKS AND BLENDS IN 1 STEP: Steam and automatically blend foods with the push of a button in one bowl. No transfer after cooking required
Makes homemade baby food in as little as 10 minutes for every stage of development including purees and mashes
COMPLETE SYSTEM TO MAKE, STORE & SERVE BABY FOOD: Includes 3.5 cup capacity bowl with 3 reusable food pouches and filling funnels for serving and storing baby food
EASY TO CLEAN: Steam tank can be opened completely for easy cleaning. Bowl and blade are dishwasher-safe
EASY TO USE: Includes easy to use control panel and removable water tank for easy filling
3 SETTINGS: Steam only, blend only or automatically blend after steaming
INCLUDES 12 PIECES and 1 YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY (not valid on purchases shipped outside US)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,227 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
